question: An object is moving in a straight line at a constant speed. What will happen to the object if no outside force acts on the object?
candidate_answers: (A) The speed and direction of the object will change. (B) The speed and direction of the object will not change. (C) The direction of the object will change; the speed will remain constant. (D) The speed of the object will change; the direction will remain constant.
answer: The speed and direction of the object will not change.
label: B
